com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Class ThemeTuple

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme.ThemeTuple

  • public final class ThemeTuple
extends java.lang.Object
    Data structure used to reduce argument count. Describes what theme and graphical and logical level is to be used.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int graphicalLevel
      The panel nesting level.
      int logicalLevel
      The logical nesting level.
      ITheme theme
      The theme to be used.

      • ThemeTuple

        public ThemeTuple(ThemeTuple previous,
                  int logicalDiff,
                  int graphicalDiff)
        Create a new theme tuple from a old one.
        Parameters:
        previous - the base tuple
        logicalDiff - the difference in logical level
        graphicalDiff - the difference in panel level
